property.name: titleColor
property.label: Title Color
property.description: Color of the component title. Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values.

property.name: totalItems
property.label: Number of Actions
property.description: If using the base layout, only 8 items will be displayed to avoid spacing issues.

property.name: layout
property.label: Layout
property.description: Base layout displays up to 10 tiles that display side by side with text inside the tile. Icon displays up to 10 actions with an icon, text or image above the link text.

property.name: ctaText1
property.label: 1 - Text
property.description: This will accept rich text or custom labels. To include labels use: $Label.namespace.labelName.

property.name: ctaDescription1
property.label: 1 - Description
property.description: This will accept rich text or custom labels. To include labels use: $Label.namespace.labelName.

property.name: ctaImage1
property.label: 1 - Image path, icon or text
property.description: If using the icon layout you can use a slds icon. To use an icon specify the category then the icon name separated by a ":". For example utility:add. If using the icon layout you may also enter text as well. This only should be done if using a short acronym. For example ABC

property.name: useText1
property.label: 1 - Use text as icon
property.description: Check this box if you entered text instead of an image.

property.name: ctaBackgroundSize1
property.label: 1 - Background Size
property.description: This will only take affect if you are using the base layout

property.name: iconColor1
property.label: 1 - Icon Color
property.description: This will only take effect if you are using the icon layout

property.name: ctaTextColor1
property.label: 1 - Text Color
property.description: The color of the text inside of the dashboard item. The default is the community link text color

property.name: ctaOverlay1
property.label: 1 - Use image overlay
property.description: This overlay will only take effect when using the base layout

property.name: ctaDefaultColor
property.label: Text - Default Color
property.description: This will accept any color format that is supported by browsers. If left blank the color will default to the community color brand

property.name: fontSize
property.label: Text - Font size
property.description: Adjust the font size of the text. Leave blank for default.

property.name: ctaBorderRadius
property.label: Image - Border radius
property.description: Use a percentage like '50%' for a circle, or '0px' for a square.

property.name: ctaDefaultBack
property.label: Image - Default background color
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. If left blank the color will default to the community color brand.

property.name: ctaHeight
property.label: Image - Height or Width
property.description: On base layout this will be the height of the calls to action. On the icon layout this will be the height and width of the shape that holds the icon.

property.name: ctaDefaultIconSize
property.label: Icon - Size
property.description: This will only take effect if you are using the icon layout. This is configured based on default Salesforce Icon Sizes.

property.name: ctaDefaultIconColor
property.label: Icon - Default color
property.description: This will only take effect if you are using the icon layout. This will accept any color format that is supported by browsers. If left blank the color will default to the community color brand

property.name: ctaOverlayColor
property.label: Overlay - Color
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. RGBA is best for transparency. Leave blank for default.

property.name: ctaOverlayColorHover
property.label: Overlay - Hover color
property.description: Use hex, RGB, or RGBA color values. RGBA is best for transparency. Leave blank for default.

property.name: ctaSpacing
property.label: Item spacing (in px)
property.description: Enter the spacing between items in pixels as an integer. (i.e., '10', for 10 pixels)

property.name: itemsPerRowBase
property.label: Items Per Row - Mobile
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Mobile-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: itemsPerRowSmall
property.label: Items Per Row - Small
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Small-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: itemsPerRowMedium
property.label: Items Per Row - Tablet
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Tablet-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: itemsPerRowLarge
property.label: Items Per Row - Desktop
property.description: Shows this many items in each row for Desktop-sized screens. 'auto' may be useful if the amount of items to be shown aren't divisible by 12.

property.name: customClassName
property.label: Custom Class Name
property.description: Custom CSS class name. Usually remains blank.
